column2: your Personal Information and Other Information
"Personal Information" we mean information that would allow someone to identify you or contact you, such as your full name, postal address, e-mail address or telephone number.
"Other Information", we mean any information other than Personal Information that may be collected about you (Personal Information and Other Information, together, the "Information").
you may be required to provide your email address, date of birth and zip code separate from any user registration.
